item.title: In 2017, the Brunei freight and logistics market had a value of US$157.25 million
item.description:
A new report by Mordor Intelligence, titled “Brunei Freight & Logistics Market Study - Market Trends, Analysis & Forecasts to 2023,” has been added to ResearchAndMarkets.com’s collection. The Brunei freight and logistics market, valued at US$157.25 million in 2017, sees its biggest opportunity in the multi-trillion dollar halal industry. Mordor Intelligence highlights Brunei’s positive image within the Islamic world, where it is regarded as a hub of Islamic culture. Brunei’s strategic location for China, along with its alignment with the Belt and Road project, presents significant opportunities for its halal certification industry...

item.title: The Brunei boot camp is designed to assist small and medium-sized enterprises in transitioning to digital platforms
item.description:
DHgate, the APEC Business Advisory Council (ABAC) China, and ABAC Brunei have initiated the Asia Pacific Economic Cooperation Cross-Border E-commerce Training (APEC CBET) boot camp in Brunei. This program aims to develop more skilled professionals within the cross-border e-commerce sector and elevate industry training standards. E-commerce exporters see a greater first-year survival rate (60-80%) than traditional businesses (30-50%), according to the APEC CBET website. E-commerce also allows exporters to reach around 40 different economies compared to just three to four for traditional exporters...
